question: What should I do if I think my eligibility results are wrong?
text:
What should I do if I think my eligibility results are wrong?
          
        
(Desplazarse hacia abajo para ver Preguntas Ms Frecuentes en Espaol)
If you believe your eligibility determination is incorrect, first review the information that you submitted on your application to ensure that it is accurate. To do so, navigate to your member dashboard and click View Application.  If you notice anything that needs to be updated, click Edit Application, make the appropriate changes, and re-submit your application.

If you've confirmed that the information in your application is accurate and you still believe your eligibility results are incorrect, you can submit an appeal. The following types of decisions are generally eligible for appeal through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace:


Your eligibility to buy health coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.

The Advanced Premium Tax Credits (including the dollar amount of your tax credit) you are eligible to receive

The Cost Sharing Reductions (including the dollar amount of your Cost Sharing Reductions) you are eligible to receive

Your ability to enroll in or change plans through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace outside of an open enrollment period

Your ability to enroll in coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace because Virginia's Insurance Marketplace told you that you failed to submit documents proving you were ineligible for other types of health coverage

Virginia's Insurance Marketplace did not provide you with a timely eligibility determination after you applied for insurance coverage

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Si cree que su determinacin de elegibilidad es incorrecta, primero revise la informacin que ha presentado en su solicitud para garantizar que es correcta. Para hacerlo, vaya a su panel de miembro y haga clic en View Application (Ver solicitud).  Si nota algo que debe ser actualizado, haga clic en Edit Application (Editar solicitud) para realizar los cambios apropiados y volver a enviar su solicitud.

Si ha confirmado que la informacin en su solicitud es correcta y usted todava considera que sus resultados de elegibilidad son incorrectos, puede presentar una apelacin. Los siguientes tipos de decisiones en general son elegibles para apelacin a travs de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace:


Su elegibilidad para adquirir una cobertura mdica a travs de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.

El Crdito Fiscal Adelantado para la Prima (incluido el monto de su Crdito Fiscal) que usted califica para recibir

La Reduccin de Costos Compartidos (incluido el monto de sus Reducciones de Costos Compartidos) que usted califica para recibir

Su capacidad para inscribirse o cambiar de plan a travs de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace fuera de un perodo de inscripcin abierta

Su capacidad para inscribirse en cobertura a travs de Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, porque Virginia's Insurance Marketplace le inform que no present los documentos que prueban que no califica para otros tipos de cobertura mdica

Virginia's Insurance Marketplace no le brind una decisin a tiempo despus de haber solicitado cobertura de seguro
